author: rangadi
msg: HADOOP-3673. Avoid deadlock caused by DataNode RPC receoverBlock().

author: doll
msg: Patch from Adam Winer. The new dataservice *service interfaces now use Futures. This allows an implementor to do real batching because all of the futures get executed at once.
Note: This patch looks large because it touches so many lines but it is really pretty trivial.

author: gates
msg: PIG-287 Modified test to confirm bug is fixed.  Thanks Santhosh.
